1.content:
getting off the airplane you marveled at the wonderfull forests you left behind. looking at the awards you were given you said
"45.0000 dollars pay for all that fucking fun i had **sigh** lets go shoping
1.title: home at last

11.content:
after buying about 27 metal CDs you see an antiuqe shop so you walk in.
"ellllooooooo my leetil freend" the shop keeper said with a thick russian acsent. "how much?" you say pointing to an old outfit on a manquin. the outfit consisted of a blue cape, black boots, long gloves with gold stitching and large crystals on top, and was finished by a long blue phidora with tapered tips and a gold symbol liking a wave going over an orb on the front.
"hiiiiiiiimmmmmmmmmm..............1200$" said the shop tender.
rei pondered this transaction. 1200$ is alot of cake
"Wellllllllll............ i did just fight for THREE years staight ....... I"LL TAKE IT!"

********************

ariving home in your sargants humvee you step out
"have a good break sir" the sgt. said,
"Hah giving me orders sargant! you to" you retort
you step up to the front door and take a deep breath then
11.title: nice threads

12.content:
suddenly the hapache escort explodes and the roter impales you causing you to say
" FUCK! not again........ bleeeeeeeghgeheeeeghhhhhhh! **dies**"

12.title: die

info.brief_description: imagine if you had a lucario........ who likes you
info.description:
you are a 16 year old boy named Rei,Stark.
an acsedent in a lab you worked in left you a semi milotic antho, showen by red bangs a scaled left foot and right hand, and a red left eye to contrast your blue right eye
at 13 you were sent away via enrolement letter to the imenent war in the south against your will. forcing you to leave your new friend lucario and mother to become the biggest killing machine in the "Metal forces devision". always missing your mother, riolu, and dead brother, you became 1st LT, platimum class *(eqivant rank to comander) your mutations got you the nicknames "Bladed demon" ""heartless" "the friged wraith".showing no mercy your unit killed hundreds. after a broken roter of an exploding hapache impaled you. you were sent home to find a lucario happy to see you after a medical record was sent home saying the wound was deathly.
